column5: This is a 3 bedroom 3 bathroom condo. It is equipped with a full kitchen and all the cooking utensils that you may need..  Break away from everyday life and retreat to country living at WorldMark Marble Falls. Relax in comfort in a one-, two- or three-bedroom unit; or a two-bedroom penthouse, three-bedroom penthouse, one-bedroom Presidential or two-bedroom Presidential unit. Your new rustic resort has everything from a brick fireplace and modern kitchen to vast view of the rural surroundings.
